ugath padam ha prathisandhanaya pilibanda janadhipathi komishan sabha warthawe sandahan nirdeshayangen wadi pramanayak me wanawitath kriyathmaka kirimata rajaya samathwa thibena bawa agawinisuru mohan piris mahatha pawasayi.eeta amatharawa shri lankawe manawa himikam surakima ha prawardhanaya sandaha jathika kriyakari salasuma thulin deshiya yanthranayak pihituwa athi bawa da ee mahatha penwa deyi.ee mahatha me bawa sandahan kale jathyanthara sabandatha saha kramamopayika adhyayanaya pilibanda lakshman kadiragamar aayathanaye pawathi nelsan mandela "mange athdakim" yana mathrukawa yatathe dakunu aprikanu winisuru aacharya albik sachs kala deshanayata sahabhagi wemini.shri lankawe abhyanthara gataluwata wisandum sewimedi dakunu aprikawe athdakim awashya paridi upayogi karaganna bawada mehidi agawinisuruwaraya pawasiya.ekineka matha randapawathima saha ekineka athara bedim athiwima wenuwata swayan wishwasaya matha nithiye karyabharaya wadidiyunu kalayuthu bawata aacharya sachs wisin siya deshanayedi karunu dakwa thibe.jagath sanwidhanaye hitapu maha lekam kofi anan mahatha wisin prakashakala paridi ratakata gaurawaniya saha thirasara samayak udakara diyahakke abhyanthara yanthranayakin bawa agawinisuruwaraya sihipath kaleya.
